author: Eric Levitz
title: It’s Insane That Federal Aid to States Is a Partisan Issue
description: The GOP is effectively treating “let’s make sure Oklahoma can afford to pay police officers” as an outrageous Democratic demand.
content:
The U.S. federal government can print its own currency, which also happens to be the worlds reserve currency. This is a handy setup for Uncle Sam in ordinary times. But its especially convenient in moments of economic crisis.
When a country can print its own… [+8168 chars]
